## Functions

### DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingBackwardScan() {#ac10429a8c82694552d49e1aba0b85491}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingBackwardScan (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Remove redundant instructions within sequences of consecutive dbg.value instructions.

This is done using a backward scan to keep the last dbg.value describing a specific variable/fragment.

<Link id="details" />


## BackwardScan strategy:



Given a sequence of consecutive <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgvalueinst">DbgValueInst</a> like this



dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;) dbg.value ..., &quot;y&quot;, FragmentY1 dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2 dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;&#42;)



then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed (it is guaranteed to be obsoleted by the instruction marked with (&#42;&#42;) as the latter instruction is describing the same variable using the same fragment info).



Possible improvements:
<ul>
<li><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> fully overlapping fragments and not only identical fragments.</li>
<li>Support dbg.declare. dbg.label, and possibly other meta instructions being part of the sequence of consecutive instructions.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00386">386</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-cpp">BasicBlockUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingForwardScan() {#a961e2695793920fc477be3d95e20babe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingForwardScan (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Remove redundant dbg.value instructions using a forward scan.

This can remove a dbg.value instruction that is redundant due to indicating that a variable has the same value as already being indicated by an earlier dbg.value.

<Link id="details" />


## ForwardScan strategy:



Given two identical dbg.value instructions, separated by a block of instructions that isn&#39;t describing the same variable, like this



dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;&#42;) &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt; dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;)



then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed. Variable &quot;x&quot; is already described as being mapped to the SSA value X1.



Possible improvements:
<ul>
<li>Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00503">503</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-cpp">BasicBlockUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### removeUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock() {#a579e878e02e34bf9699e3d82da2bc070}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool removeUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Remove redundant undef dbg.assign intrinsic from an entry block using a forward scan.

<Link id="details" />


## Strategy:



Scanning forward, delete dbg.assign intrinsics iff they are undef, not linked to an intrinsic, and don&#39;t share an aggregate variable with a debug intrinsic that didn&#39;t meet the criteria. In other words, undef dbg.assigns that come before non-undef debug intrinsics for the variable are deleted. Given:



dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;) &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt; dbg.value V, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2 &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt; dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1



then (only) the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed. Possible improvements:
<ul>
<li>Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00647">647</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-cpp">BasicBlockUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add insert edges first. Experimentally, for the particular case of two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks that can be merged, with a single successor and single predecessor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respectively, it is beneficial to have all insert updates first. Deleting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edges first may lead to unreachable blocks, followed by inserting edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// making the blocks reachable again. Such DT updates lead to high compile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// times. We add inserts before deletes here to reduce compile time.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove redundant instructions within sequences of consecutive dbg.value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions. This is done using a backward scan to keep the last dbg.value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// describing a specific variable/fragment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BackwardScan strategy:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ----------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given a sequence of consecutive DbgValueInst like this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;y&quot;, FragmentY1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed (it is guaranteed to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// obsoleted by the instruction marked with (&#42;&#42;) as the latter instruction is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// describing the same variable using the same fragment info).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Possible improvements:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Check fully overlapping fragments and not only identical fragments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Support dbg.declare. dbg.label, and possibly other meta instructions being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   part of the sequence of consecutive instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386" lineLink="#ac10429a8c82694552d49e1aba0b85491"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#ac10429a8c82694552d49e1aba0b85491">DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingBackwardScan</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;DbgVariableRecord &#42;, 8&gt;</a> ToBeRemoved;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove redundant dbg.value instructions using a forward scan. This can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// remove a dbg.value instruction that is redundant due to indicating that a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// variable has the same value as already being indicated by an earlier</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// dbg.value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ForwardScan strategy:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ---------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given two identical dbg.value instructions, separated by a block of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions that isn&#39;t describing the same variable, like this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed. Variable &quot;x&quot; is already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// described as being mapped to the SSA value X1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Possible improvements:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove redundant undef dbg.assign intrinsic from an entry block using a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// forward scan.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Strategy:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ---------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Scanning forward, delete dbg.assign intrinsics iff they are undef, not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// linked to an intrinsic, and don&#39;t share an aggregate variable with a debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// intrinsic that didn&#39;t meet the criteria. In other words, undef dbg.assigns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that come before non-undef debug intrinsics for the variable are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// deleted. Given:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.value %V, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then (only) the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Possible improvements:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647" lineLink="#a579e878e02e34bf9699e3d82da2bc070"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a579e878e02e34bf9699e3d82da2bc070">removeUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#ab571b8358a3a8b6db1327d06bdc5e9f4">IsNewDbgInfoFormat</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aa1970a96b57d122e4bb765d0f82e96e6">DbgVariableRecordsRemoveUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By using the &quot;backward scan&quot; strategy before the &quot;forward scan&quot; strategy we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can remove both dbg.value (2) and (3) in a situation like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (1) dbg.value V1, &quot;x&quot;, DIExpression()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (2) dbg.value V2, &quot;x&quot;, DIExpression()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (3) dbg.value V1, &quot;x&quot;, DIExpression()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The backward scan will remove (2), it is made obsolete by (3). After</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getting (2) out of the way, the foward scan will remove (3) since &quot;x&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already is described as having the value V1 at (1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MadeChanges |= <a href="#a2373ebe62ac37c5f7d838e9ca92a7f2e">removeRedundantDbgInstrsUsingBackwardScan</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4ec05121d4b54b3691ad6203e78ff54e">isEntryBlock</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the successor only has a single pred, split the top of the successor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SP == BB &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;CFG broken&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)SP;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Before=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, if BB has a single successor, split it at the bottom of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a3287172f2d13af086e6d66364e8c6de3">getNumSuccessors</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;PN : DestBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a13da92d2694197fbcb5b95fd94e7570d">phis</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We manually update the LandingPadReplacement PHINode and it is the last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHI Node. So, if we find it, we are done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Until == &amp;PN)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reuse the previous value of BBIdx if it lines up.  In cases where we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have multiple phi nodes with &#42;lots&#42; of predecessors, this is a speed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// win because we don&#39;t have to scan the PHI looking for TIBB.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// happens because the BB list of PHI nodes are usually in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PN.getIncomingBlock(BBIdx) != OldPred)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BBIdx = PN.getBasicBlockIndex(OldPred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BBIdx != -1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid PHI Index!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PN.setIncomingBlock(BBIdx, NewPred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a833a6084a93d5900e8bdd493b37bbbc7"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a833a6084a93d5900e8bdd493b37bbbc7">llvm::ehAwareSplitEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/criticaledgesplittingoptions">CriticalEdgeSplittingOptions</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;BBName) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PadInst = Succ-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a362b5e6097732cbc0d2fb555a1f73400">getFirstNonPHIIt</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adf83581f514774264d616eef5706cf6e">SplitEdge</a>(BB, Succ, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.DT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.LI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.MSSAU, BBName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.LI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> LoopPreds;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if extra modifications will be required to preserve loop-simplify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form after splitting. If it would require splitting blocks with IndirectBr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminators, bail out if preserving loop-simplify form is requested.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.PreserveLoopSimplify &amp;&amp; LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;BBLoop = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(BB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only way that we can break LoopSimplify form by splitting a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// critical edge is when there exists some edge from BBLoop to Succ &#42;and&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the only edge into Succ from outside of BBLoop is that of NewBB after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the split. If the first isn&#39;t true, then LoopSimplify still holds,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewBB is the new exit block and it has no non-loop predecessors. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// second isn&#39;t true, then Succ was not in LoopSimplify form prior to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the split as it had a non-loop predecessor. In both of these cases,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the predecessor must be directly in BBLoop, not in a subloop, or again</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopSimplify doesn&#39;t hold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(Succ)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> == BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new block is known.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI-&gt;getLoopFor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) != BBLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop is not in LoopSimplify form, no need to re simplify after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// splitting edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LoopPreds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LoopPreds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop-simplify form can be preserved, if we can split all in-loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(LoopPreds, &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;IndirectBrInst&gt;</a>(Pred-&gt;getTerminator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewBB =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aa286a0f7f5d38488d593bb7ef0ba183e">getContext</a>(), BBName, BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>(), Succ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae2c2758db51113863d0114f08c4b482a">setUnwindEdgeTo</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>(), NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac1ced98ffeb2b6991821751661b136d6">updatePhiNodes</a>(Succ, BB, NewBB, LandingPadReplacement);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;NewPHI =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE! This loop walks backwards for a reason! First off, this minimizes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the cost of removal if we end up removing a large number of values, and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (int64&#95;t i = PN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#aef51af4b490af6b3bf2dfbc8737a8f9f">getNumIncomingValues</a>() - 1; i &gt;= 0; --i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PredSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(IncomingBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Splitting the predecessors of a loop header creates a preheader block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI &amp;&amp; LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a727d0e43acb5bfa1468c281ee3eef91f">isLoopHeader</a>(BB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Using the loop start line number prevents debuggers stepping into the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ae8f5bf5cc06f696b52c709677df00fbf">setDebugLoc</a>(L-&gt;getStartLoc());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move the edges from Preds to point to NewBB instead of BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : Preds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;IndirectBrInst&gt;</a>(Pred-&gt;getTerminator()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node becomes an incoming value for BB&#39;s phi node.  However, if the Preds</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Pred1 = SomePHI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#ac53e1aabdf64e91b8b325bcac250d8a9">getIncomingBlock</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Pred2 = SomePHI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#ac53e1aabdf64e91b8b325bcac250d8a9">getIncomingBlock</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab5b46bfb4c91a29504b08dacfeb04a6c">pred&#95;iterator</a> PI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac3e549d97549636a7f08779d5cd98540">pred&#95;begin</a>(BB), PE = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2103c335fa6ab933312c3871c82b0106">pred&#95;end</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only handle branches.  Other control flow will be lowered to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches if possible anyway.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;Pred1Br = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(Pred1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Eliminate code duplication by ensuring that Pred1Br is conditional if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either are.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred2Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a7e4be8b16fbd68c9045a388904044e01">isConditional</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both branches are conditional, we don&#39;t have an &quot;if statement&quot;.  In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reality, we could transform this case, but since the condition will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// required anyway, we stand no chance of eliminating it, so the xform is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// probably not profitable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred1Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a7e4be8b16fbd68c9045a388904044e01">isConditional</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"></CodeLine>
